inputs.selection_motivation: UST 2‑year yields are the least influential of the UST maturities for Euro Stoxx 50, providing the weakest correlation relative to other handles, and can be replaced by the more timely US Core PCE link.

prioritized_link.motivation: Euro Stoxx 50 movements are strongly linked to US Core PCE releases, as US inflation data drives global risk appetite and capital flows into European equities.
